main event: On January 23, 1961, a low, irregular, triangular, flashing red light was observed moving swiftly and silently before disappearing into haze.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 10-12 minutes,The object appeared about 1-2 degrees above the horizon,The light moved rapidly and did not hover,The report describes the light as quite definite,No photographs were included with this record.
sighted object: low, irregular, triangular, flashing red light
witness description: The report does not specify any witnesses.
